title: Bone Glove
summaries: The Bone Glove is an Expert Mode-exclusive item obtained from the Treasure Bag dropped by Skeletron.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Bone Glove is an <linked>accessory</linked> which throws two crossed bones every time a <linked>weapon</linked> is used, at maximum once per second. The bones can bounce off walls three times or pierce two <linked>enemies</linked> before being destroyed, deal 25 classless damage, and additionally have 25 <linked>armor penetration</linked>.

On the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Bone Glove is a ranged weapon which allows the player to throw two crossed bones that can bounce off walls three times or pierce two enemies before being destroyed. It consumes one Bone per throw and has a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance not to consume any.
Its best modifier is Unreal.

statistics.Tooltip: Shoots crossbones at enemies while you are attacking
